meanings.definition: The flesh of an animal used as food.
meanings.sent1: I cooked some delicious meat for dinner.
meanings.sent2: The butcher displayed various types of meat in the shop.
meanings.sent3: The meat was so tasty that it made everyone at the table smile.
meanings.sent4: Her words were the meat of the conversation, providing the most substance.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of sizzling meat filled the kitchen, making my mouth water.

meanings.definition: The edible part of fruits or nuts.
The essence or substance of something.
